import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button } from "react-bootstrap"; const Register = () => { const [showRegister, setShowRegister] = useState("none"); const [showLogin, setShowLogin] = useState("none"); //toggle display of login form const toggleRegister = () => { if (showRegister === "none") { setShowRegister("block"); } else if (showRegister === "block") { setShowRegister("none"); } }; const toggleLogin = () => { if (showLogin === "none") { setShowLogin("block"); } else if (showLogin === "block") { setShowLogin("none"); } }; return (







); }; export default Register;
